channel.title: David on Alpha Church
channel.description: Recent content in David on Alpha Church

item.title: Fighting Giants: David's Other Goliaths
item.description: David, the young shepherd boy, in slaying Goliath, the giant of Gath, has long provided God’s people with many lessons of life. One of which is how to face adversity larger than themselves and with God’s help overcoming is assured. This provided a message of confidence in standing for the right and completely destroying the difficulties of life. We see in this that God is not limited by the size and strength of our problems that confront us.
